name: compress_image
description: Compress image by reducing quality and/or size while maintaining visual quality. Supports multiple output formats and quality settings.

image_path.description: Path to the input image file

quality.description: JPEG quality (1-100). Higher values mean better quality but larger file size

max_width.description: Maximum width in pixels. If provided, image will be resized maintaining aspect ratio

max_height.description: Maximum height in pixels. If provided, image will be resized maintaining aspect ratio

output_format.description: Output format for the compressed image

output_path.description: Path for the output image. If not provided, will create compressed version with suffix
